verses.text: \w Open|strong="H6605"\w* thy \w doors|strong="H1817"\w*, O \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, that the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* may \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* thy \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*.

\w Howl|strong="H3213"\w*, fir \w tree|strong="H1265"\w*; for the \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* is \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*; because the \w mighty|strong="H0117"\w* are \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*: \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*, O ye \w oaks|strong="H0437"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*; for the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* of the \w vintage|strong="H1208"\w* is come \w down|strong="H3381"\w*.\f + \fr 11.2 \ft mighty: or, gallants\f*\f + \fr 11.2 \ft the forest…: or, the defenced forest\f*

¶ \add There is\add* a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w howling|strong="H3215"\w* of the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*; for their \w glory|strong="H0155"\w* is \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*: a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w roaring|strong="H7581"\w* of young \w lions|strong="H3715"\w*; for the \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* is \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*.
Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w Feed|strong="H7462"\w* the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* of the \w slaughter|strong="H2028"\w*;

Whose \w possessors|strong="H7069"\w* \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* them, and hold themselves not \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w*: and they that \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* them \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for I am \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*: and their own \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w pity|strong="H2550"\w* them not.

For I will no more \w pity|strong="H2550"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but, lo, I will \w deliver|strong="H4672"\w* the \w men|strong="H0120"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* into his \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of his \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: and they shall \w smite|strong="H3807"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and out of their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* I will not \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \add them\add*.\f + \fr 11.6 \ft deliver: Heb. make to be found\f*

And I will \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* of \w slaughter|strong="H2028"\w*, \add even\add* \w you|strong="H3651"\w*, O \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*. And I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* unto me \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w staves|strong="H4731"\w*; the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* I \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Beauty|strong="H5278"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* I \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Bands|strong="H2254"\w*; and I \w fed|strong="H7462"\w* the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.\f + \fr 11.7 \ft even…: or, verily the poor\f*\f + \fr 11.7 \ft Bands: or, Binders\f*

\w Three|strong="H7969"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* also I cut \w off|strong="H3582"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w month|strong="H3391"\w*; and my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w lothed|strong="H7114"\w* them, and their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* also \w abhorred|strong="H0973"\w* me.\f + \fr 11.8 \ft lothed…: Heb. was straightened for them\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, I will not \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* you: that that \w dieth|strong="H4191"\w*, let it \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; and that that is to be cut \w off|strong="H3582"\w*, let it be cut \w off|strong="H3582"\w*; and let the \w rest|strong="H7604"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* every \w one|strong="H0802"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of \w another|strong="H7468"\w*.\f + \fr 11.9 \ft another: Heb. his fellow, or, neighbour\f*

¶ And I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* my \w staff|strong="H4731"\w*, \add even\add* \w Beauty|strong="H5278"\w*, and cut it \w asunder|strong="H1438"\w*, that I might \w break|strong="H6565"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* which I had \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And it was \w broken|strong="H6565"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: and so the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* that \w waited|strong="H8104"\w* upon me \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* that it \add was\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 11.11 \ft so…: or, the poor of the flock, etc. certainly knew\f*

And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, If ye \w think|strong="H5869"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w give|strong="H3051"\w* \add me\add* my \w price|strong="H7939"\w*; and if not, \w forbear|strong="H2308"\w*. So they \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* for my \w price|strong="H7939"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \add pieces\add* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.\f + \fr 11.12 \ft If ye…: Heb. If it be good in your eyes\f*

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Cast|strong="H7993"\w* it unto the \w potter|strong="H3335"\w*: a \w goodly|strong="H0145"\w* \w price|strong="H3366"\w* that I was prised \w at|strong="H3365"\w* of them. And I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \add pieces\add* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* them to the \w potter|strong="H3335"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Then I cut \w asunder|strong="H1438"\w* mine \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w staff|strong="H4731"\w*, \add even\add* \w Bands|strong="H2254"\w*, that I might \w break|strong="H6565"\w* the \w brotherhood|strong="H0264"\w* between \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 11.14 \ft Bands: or, Binders\f*

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* unto thee yet the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of a \w foolish|strong="H0196"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*.

For, lo, I will raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* a \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \add which\add* shall not \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* those that be cut \w off|strong="H3582"\w*, neither shall \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the young \w one|strong="H5289"\w*, nor \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* that that is \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, nor \w feed|strong="H3557"\w* that that \w standeth|strong="H5324"\w* still: but he shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of the \w fat|strong="H1277"\w*, and \w tear|strong="H6561"\w* their \w claws|strong="H6541"\w* in \w pieces|strong="H6561"\w*.\f + \fr 11.16 \ft cut off: or, hidden\f*\f + \fr 11.16 \ft feed: or, bear\f*

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to the \w idol|strong="H0457"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7473"\w* that \w leaveth|strong="H5800"\w* the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*! the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \add shall be\add* upon his \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, and upon his \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*: his \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* shall be \w clean|strong="H3001"\w* dried \w up|strong="H3001"\w*, and his \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* shall be \w utterly|strong="H3543"\w* \w darkened|strong="H3543"\w*.
